name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior iOS Engineer with 10+ years of experience delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and finance sectors. Proficient in **Swift**, **SwiftUI**, **Kotlin**, and **TypeScript**, with a strong focus on building innovative user interfaces and optimized application performance. Skilled in leveraging **GraphQL** for efficient data fetching and using **Postgres** for robust database management. Experienced in cloud-based development utilizing **GCP** and **Terraform** for infrastructure as code. Proficient in deploying containerized applications with **Kubernetes** and implementing CI/CD pipelines, ensuring streamlined development and delivery processes. 
Brings significant expertise in full-stack development with hands-on knowledge of **Python** and frameworks such as **React**, as well as experience with **FastAPI** and **Django**. Demonstrates a solid understanding of deploying enterprise solutions that incorporate AI/ML capabilities and comply with industry standards. Passionate about building secure, maintainable, and impactful software solutions.

experience.responsibilities:

• Developed secure APIs with **GraphQL** to enhance app functionality and improve data-fetching efficiency, optimizing for response times under **200ms**.
• Created cross-platform mobile applications employing **Kotlin** and **Jetpack**, applying best practices to ensure code readability and maintainability.
• Collaborated with backend teams to integrate robust data handling using **Postgres** for efficient data storage and retrieval, maintaining database performance under concurrent loads of **1000+** users.
• Participated in deployment processes leveraging **GCP** and **Terraform** to automate infrastructure provisioning, reducing deployment times by **30%**.
• Implemented application monitoring and error logging systems, ensuring uptime and performance are maintained above **99.9%**.
• Built CI/CD pipelines using **Kubernetes** to streamline development workflows and ensure rapid release cycles for iOS applications.
• Employed design principles and coding standards to deliver apps compatible with the latest iOS versions (iOS 14 and above), conducting rigorous testing for smooth operation on a variety of devices.
• Contributed to the architectural design of applications, influencing mobile strategies and technology choices while ensuring scalability and intuitive user interfaces.
